content:
path /v3/solana/account/balance/address
operationId SolanaGetBalance
parameters
description Account address you want to get balance of
in path
name address
required True
schema
type string
summary Get Solana Account balance
description 1 credit per API callGet Solana account balance in SOL This method does not prints any balance of the SPL or NFT tokens on the account
responses
200
SolBalance
type object
balance
type string
description Balance in SOL
description OK
